segments.text: Do you know which bus will take me from PHS to Sons ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which Sons do you want to go to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's on Fair Oaks and Orange Grove .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You actually need to catch two buses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , which ones do I need to take ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The first bus you need to get on is the 268 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Once you get to Fair Oaks and Washington , get off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You need to get on the 261 . It goes all the way to Sons .
segments.speaker: S2
